synopsis.text: Bells jingle as Christmas Eve unfolds, but for one boy named Santa, the festive season only brings a sense of loneliness and neglect. Born on this very day, his parents never seem to acknowledge his birthday or the holiday itself, leaving him feeling forgotten. But this Christmas Eve, everything changes when Mai, a charming and dedicated Santa-in-training, magically appears before him. Determined to bring joy and happiness to Santa's life, Mai embarks on a mission to show him the true enchantment of Christmas. As the night unfolds, Santa and Mai form an unbreakable bond, and the young boy discovers the heartwarming magic that can only be found during this special time of year. With Mai by his side, Santa might just experience the most unforgettable Christmas of his life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
